alert.note: Alert for Armstrong (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued February 17 at 10:34AM EST until February 19 at 2:06PM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...The Flood Watch is extended for the following rivers in Pennsylvania... Allegheny River At CW Bill Young Dam affecting Allegheny County. ...The National Weather Service in Pittsburgh PA has issued a Flood Watch for the following rivers in Pennsylvania... Allegheny River At Mosgrove affecting Armstrong County. Allegheny River At Kittanning affecting Armstrong County. Allegheny River At Natrona affecting Allegheny and Westmoreland Counties.
info.instruction: If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Additional information is available at weather.gov/pbz. PAZ022-180300- /O.NEW.KPBZ.FL.A.0006.220219T1000Z-220219T1906Z/ /KTTP1.0.ER.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.NO/ 1034 AM EST Thu Feb 17 2022 ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE FRIDAY NIGHT TO EARLY SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Allegheny River at Kittanning. * WHEN...From late Friday night to early Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Navigation suspended, lock out of service. At 19.6 feet, Lock walls overtopped. At 21.2 feet, South Water Street, Mulberry Street and Arch Street flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM EST Thursday the stage was 12.1 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
